summary: Quiz app updates: expand quiz page to 100 meaningful finance quizzes, update private dashboard styling, add public cookie consent, update compare page content, change contact email, and add a finance-themed favicon.
known_issues: Quiz page currently shows only 2 quizzes; expected 100.
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Redesign into a finance-related, logo-like mark (favicon.svg > favicon.svg)

existing_features.title: Expand the quiz question dataset to include 100 meaningful, finance-related quiz questions (mixed finance topics) so the quiz page can run through questions and validate answers properly (not just 2 questions).
Update the authenticated/private dashboard layout so the entire sidebar navigation background is violet.
Implement a cookie-consent popup on public (non-authenticated) pages that includes an Accept button and can be dismissed/remembered after acceptance.
Update the displayed contact email address to fwiseai@gmail.com anywhere it appears in the public contact/support UI.
Update the Compare page to remove the “No Ads” and “Video Lessons” rows from the comparison table.
Create and apply a finance-related, logo-like favicon for the site.

new_feature_requests.summary: Generate and add 100 meaningful finance-related quizzes on the quiz page, with proper question/answer functionality (currently only 2).
Change private dashboard sidebar to have a violet background (entire sidebar).
Add cookie consent popup on public pages with an Accept button.
Create and apply a finance-themed logo-like favicon.
Remove "No ads" and "Video lessons" from the compare page.

projectName: Expand quiz content to 100 questions, add cookie consent, update dashboard sidebar styling, compare/contact updates, and finance favicon
